key_changes: Removed Button component with Filters label and FilterListIcon
Removed wrapper Box component that contained both SearchField and Filters Button
Simplified layout by moving SearchField directly to flex container

patterns_discovered.description: Unused icon imports are removed when their corresponding UI elements are deleted
patterns_discovered.significance: Maintains import hygiene and reduces bundle size

patterns_discovered.description: Wrapping Box containers are removed when they only served to group removed elements
patterns_discovered.significance: Reduces component nesting and simplifies JSX structure

patterns_discovered.description: Search component maintained in same location with identical props and functionality
patterns_discovered.significance: Core search feature unaffected by filter removal

gotchas_discovered.description: Straightforward removal with no complex dependencies or side effects

approach_outcome.execution_notes: Filter button and its associated icon import were cleanly removed. The containing Box wrapper was eliminated, and the SearchField component was promoted to the flex container level. No refactoring of related functionality was needed.

recommendations.recommendation: Verify that SearchField remains properly aligned and spaced in the header after removal of the Filters button
Consider if filter functionality should be replaced with enhanced search capabilities or moved to a different UI location
Current implementation maintains good separation of concerns - search logic remains intact
